Text:
to the person who ripped and uploaded this, thanks heaps. Love hong kong movies, especially the old ones.

seems like the best way to watch it is tu use vlc player though

the sounds is very mono like :(

i suggest people to take up chinese, cause the subtitles suck more then usual
Says Chinese/Cantonese. Does that mean mandarin and cantonese or Cantonese-chinese.
cantonese, its a hong kong movie
